GET /api.description: Serves up a JSON representation of all the available endpoints of the API.

GET /api/topics.description: Serves an array of all topics.

GET /api/articles.description: Serves an array of all articles.

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Fetches all comments for a given article ID. Returns an array of comments, sorted by most recent first.

params.article_id: The ID of the article to fetch comments for.

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Adds a new comment to the specified article ID. Returns the newly posted comment.

params.article_id: The ID of the article to add a comment to.

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Deletes comment by comment ID. Responds with status 204 and no content.
